title: Maryam Featured in Brussels Times
excerpt: From starvation to solution: Kenyan PhD student in Belgium fights to end global malnutrition with insect-fortified foods
content: MaryaNutri was recently featured in a comprehensive article by Brussels Times, highlighting our mission to combat global malnutrition through innovative insect-fortified food solutions. The article explores our founder's journey from Kenya to Belgium and the development of sustainable nutrition solutions.
author: The Brussels Times

title: MaryaNutri Featured in Nieuwsblad
excerpt: “Ik was het beu om mensen te zien sterven”: Maryam wil met onderzoek naar opvallende 'superfood' ondervoeding aanpakken
content: MaryaNutri was recently featured in a comprehensive article by Nieuwsblad, highlighting our mission to combat global malnutrition through innovative insect-fortified food solutions. The article explores our founder's journey from Kenya to Belgium and the development of sustainable nutrition solutions.
author: Levi Verbauwhede, Nieuwsblad

title: Maryam Featured in De Tijd
excerpt: Zelf overleefde ze ooit op termieten, nu bestrijdt ze honger met insectenpap
content: Maryam was recently featured in an article by De Tijd, highlighting her journey from Kenya to Belgium, her personal experience with malnutrition and the development of sustainable nutrition solutions. The article is published in the highly influential Dutch newspaper De Tijd.
author: Emma Verplancke, De Tijd

title: MaryaNutri Launch Event
excerpt: We're organizing a launch event for MaryaNutri @ the Wintercircus in Ghent
content:
We're organizing an open-for-everyone launch event for MaryaNutri in the beautiful Wintercircus tech start-up campus in Ghent. We'll be there on June 24th, 2025, from 4-8pm. Come and meet us, learn about our mission, and taste our products!

Be among the first 300 to register and get a free drink! You can RSVP through this form: 
https://forms.gle/MMCXeBCXb1254Fpx5
author: Team MaryaNutri
